name: NFT Vending Machine
description:
This file contains the visual assets used for an NFT vending machine proof of concept that I developed at the 2022 Los Angeles Hacker House presented by Metaplex, Solana, and FTX US. It includes both the user interface assets used for the vending machine UI as well as the artwork that was used in the NFTs that were minted.


The source code and additional details for this project are available on GitHub.
